statements: SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, user_id FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_revoked = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, consent_given_at FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_valid_until < NOW();
SELECT user_id, consent_given_at, consent_valid_until FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, user_id, consent_revoked FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, user_id, consent_given_at FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_revoked = true ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, consent_given_at, consent_valid_until FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_valid_until IS NOT NULL ORDER BY consent_valid_until ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_valid_until >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND consent_revoked = false ORDER BY consent_given_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, agreement_type FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT agreement_type, agreement_date FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'GDPR';
SELECT * FROM user_data_privacy;
SELECT user_id, has_agreed FROM user_data_privacy WHERE has_agreed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT consent_id, user_id, agreement_date FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Marketing' AND agreement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY agreement_date ASC;
SELECT a.consent_id, a.agreement_date, b.has_agreed FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements AS a JOIN user_data_privacy AS b ON a.user_id = b.user_id;
SELECT MAX(consent_id) AS max_consent_id, MIN(agreement_date) AS min_agreement_date FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements;
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consent_agreements WHERE agreement_type LIKE '%consent%' AND agreement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consents;
SELECT user_id, agreement_text FROM data_privacy_consents ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, email_address FROM user_details WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT user_id FROM consent_logs WHERE action_taken = 'Accepted';
SELECT * FROM consent_logs WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_consents WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_details WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT consent_id, agreement_text, agreement_date FROM data_privacy_consents WHERE agreement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_taken, action_date FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, c.agreement_text FROM user_details u JOIN data_privacy_consents c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM privacy_consent_agreements
SELECT user_id, consent_date FROM privacy_consent_agreements ORDER BY consent_date DESC
SELECT user_id, data_controller_id FROM privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name
SELECT controller_name, contact_email FROM data_controllers
SELECT * FROM privacy_consent_agreements WHERE user_id = 101
SELECT consent_id, user_id, consent_date FROM privacy_consent_agreements ORDER BY consent_date DESC

SELECT users.first_name, users.last_name, privacy_consent_agreements.consent_date FROM users INNER JOIN privacy_consent_agreements ON users.user_id = privacy_consent_agreements.user_id WHERE privacy_consent_agreements.data_controller_id = 201

SELECT data_controllers.controller_name, data_controllers.contact_email, consent_logs.action_type FROM data_controllers INNER JOIN consent_logs ON data_controllers.controller_id = consent_logs.consent_id
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM consent_logs WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM privacy_consent_agreements WHERE consent_date >= '2022-01-01')
SELECT * FROM consent_agreements;
SELECT user_id, agreement_date, agreement_text FROM consent_agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Terms of Service';
SELECT org_name, industry FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM data_categories WHERE category_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM consent_agreements WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT agreement_text, agreement_date FROM consent_agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Terms of Service';
SELECT org_name, industry FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM data_categories WHERE category_description IS NOT NULL;
